laboratory_examinations.findings: Neutrophilic leukocytosis, normal ESR, negative rheumatoid factor, anti-CCP antibody, and antinuclear antibody (ANA) in the child.
Negative rheumatoid factor in both the child and the mother.
Negative anti-CCP antibody in both the child and the mother.
Negative ANA in both the child and the mother.
Heterozygous mutation at the NOD2 gene (exon 4, c.1000C > T, p.Arg334Trp) in the child; mother homozygous and younger daughter heterozygous for the same mutation.
